title: Grid columns mismatch - Code App shows different columns than MDA
reproSteps: 1. Open Projects list in both apps. 2. Compare column headers.
expected: MDA shows: Project Name, Status, Priority, Start Date (sorted desc), End Date, Budget, Project Manager
actual: Code App now shows: Project Name, Status, Priority, Start Date, End Date, Budget, Project Manager. Matches MDA.
acceptanceCriteria: Code App grid columns match MDA exactly: same columns, same order, same headers
notes: Fixed in iteration 1. Columns now match MDA Active Projects view exactly.

title: Command bar missing buttons - Excel Templates, Export to Excel
reproSteps: 1. Open Projects list in both apps. 2. Compare command bar buttons.
expected: MDA: Back, Show Chart, +New, Delete v, Refresh, Visualize, Email a Link v, Flow v, Run Report v, Excel Templates v, Export to Excel v, ..., Share v
actual: Code App: Back, Show Chart, +New, Delete, Refresh, Visualize this view, Email a Link, Flow v, Run Report v, ..., Share. Missing: Excel Templates, Export to Excel.
acceptanceCriteria: Command bar has all MDA buttons in the same order with matching dropdowns
notes: Most buttons present but Excel-related ones missing. Some dropdown chevrons differ.

title: Left nav has Dashboard item that MDA does not have
reproSteps: 1. Compare left navigation in both apps.
expected: MDA: Home, Recent v, Pinned v, [Management] Projects, Tasks, [Tracking] Time Entries. No Dashboard.
actual: Code App: Home, Recent v, Pinned v, [MANAGEMENT] Dashboard, Projects, Tasks, [TRACKING] Time Entries.
acceptanceCriteria: Code App left nav matches MDA - no Dashboard item under Management
notes: Dashboard is a custom Code App page not present in MDA sitemap.

title: Left nav styling - background color too dark, group headers uppercase instead of Title Case
expected: MDA: White/light bg, group headers Title Case (Management, Tracking).
actual: Code App now: White bg, Title Case group headers (Management, Tracking). Matches MDA.
acceptanceCriteria: Left nav background, group header casing match MDA
notes: Fixed in iteration 1. Changed NAV_BG to #FFFFFF, removed textTransform uppercase.

title: Grid header font weight too bold, has column divider borders
expected: MDA: Normal weight headers, no column divider borders.
actual: Code App now: fontWeight 400, no borderRight. Matches MDA.
notes: Fixed in iteration 1. Changed fontWeight to 400, removed borderRight.

title: Command bar and grid have card shadows - MDA is flat
reproSteps: 1. Compare command bar and grid container styling.
expected: MDA: Flat toolbar strip, flat grid. No shadows or rounded corners.
actual: Code App now: Flat command bar with borderBottom, flat grid. No shadows or rounded corners. Matches MDA.
acceptanceCriteria: Command bar and grid are flat with no shadows, no border-radius, matching MDA
notes: Fixed in iteration 1. Removed boxShadow, borderRadius, margin from both components.

title: No row checkbox selection in Code App grid
reproSteps: 1. Open Projects list with data. 2. Try to select rows.
expected: MDA: Rows have checkboxes for single/multi-select. Header has select-all.
actual: Code App: No checkboxes. Row click navigates to form.
acceptanceCriteria: Grid rows have checkboxes matching MDA selection behavior
notes: Significant UX gap. MDA multi-select enables bulk operations.

title: Host header bar color differs (blue vs purple) - not fixable
actual: Code App: Blue header from Code App player host.
acceptanceCriteria: N/A - host chrome cannot be modified
notes: The top header is outside Code App control. Won't fix.

title: Content area background #FAFAFA vs MDA white
actual: Code App now: White (#FFFFFF) background. Matches MDA.
acceptanceCriteria: Content area background matches MDA white
notes: Fixed in iteration 1. Changed AppShell content bg from #FAFAFA to #FFFFFF.

title: New button opens QuickCreate dialog instead of full form page
expected: MDA: Opens full record form page (pagetype=entityrecord) with tabs General, Budget, Tasks, Team. Command bar: Back, Open New Window, Save, Save & Close, +New, Flow.
actual: Code App: Opens QuickCreateDialog inline. Should navigate to /projects/new form page instead.
acceptanceCriteria: New button navigates to full form page matching MDA behavior
notes: Verified: MDA opens full form at pagetype=entityrecord&etn=pic_project. Code App must navigate to form, not quick create.

title: Delete button on command bar has no dropdown chevron, MDA has one
reproSteps: 1. Compare Delete button in command bar.
expected: MDA: Delete button has a small dropdown chevron next to it.
actual: Code App: Delete button has no dropdown chevron.
acceptanceCriteria: Delete button matches MDA styling with dropdown
notes: In MDA, Delete button has a small v chevron.

title: MDA has hamburger menu icon at top of left nav, Code App does not
expected: MDA: Has a hamburger (3 lines) menu icon at top left of nav to collapse.
actual: Code App: No hamburger menu. Nav is always full width.
acceptanceCriteria: Left nav has collapse/expand hamburger like MDA
notes: MDA nav can be collapsed to icons-only mode via hamburger.
